state

Class GraphicElementState

  • java.lang.Object
    • state.GraphicElementState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GraphicElementEllipseState, GraphicElementLassoSelectState, GraphicElementMoveState, GraphicElementRectangleState, GraphicElementRemoveState, GraphicElementSelectState, GraphicElementTriangleState

    public class GraphicElementState
extends java.lang.Object
    State of the graphic element edit dialog, representing a modal mouse-based tool of which only one can be selected as active at one time.
    Author:
    geomaster
